text: Euphorbia grandidieri is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitat is sandy shores. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar Category:Vulnerable plants grandidieri Category:Plants described in 1886 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon
title: Euphorbia grandidieri
